SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(sale_record.create_at, '%Y') `key`,
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(sale_record.create_at, '%Y-%Q'), FLOOR((DATE_FORMAT(sale_record.create_at, '%m') + 2) / 3)) `key`,
DATE_FORMAT(sale_record.create_at, '%Y-%m') `key`,
DATE_FORMAT(sale_record.create_at, '%Y-%u') `key`,
DATE_FORMAT(sale_record.create_at, '%Y-%j') `key`,
FROM sale_record LEFT JOIN item_detail ON item_detail.id = sale_record.item_detail_id WHERE sale_record.create_at BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
GROUP BY `key`

SELECT
FLOOR(store.district_id / 100000) `key`,
FLOOR(store.district_id / 10000) `key`,
FLOOR(store.district_id / 100) `key`,
store.district_id `key`,
FROM sale_record LEFT JOIN store ON sale_record.store_id = store.id LEFT JOIN item_detail ON item_detail.id = sale_record.item_detail_id WHERE sale_record.create_at BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
GROUP BY `key`;
